definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: The Honolulu Blue Guest Room is a cozy cool escape from the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 檀香山蓝色客房舒适凉爽，适合躲避夏日艳阳。

sentences.english: It was a cool, misty morning when we woke near Uvinza.
sentences.chinese: 我们在乌温扎附近醒来，这是一个凉爽有雾的早晨。

sentences.english: My crown, my porphyry-basined waters cool.
sentences.chinese: 我的王冠，我的斑岩底盆水凉爽。

sentences.english: We have wran days and cool nights in early spring and late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 新奥尔良的初春和晚秋白天暖和，夜间凉爽。

sentences.english: It is night out and cool.
Her dust-caked face was bathed with a sweet, cool draft.
sentences.chinese: 她那满是灰尘的脸，沐浴在清新凉爽的空气中。

sentences.english: Cool summer nights are more than just a heaven-sent oasis from the scorching day.
sentences.chinese: 凉爽的夏夜不但是来自炙热白天天赐的绿洲。

sentences.english: Its mountains are breezily cool and inhabited mostly by goats and their herders.
sentences.chinese: 山上，凉爽微风轻拂着，仅有山羊与牧羊人长居于此。

sentences.english: If you lie on a bamboo bed in summer, you will feel cool, comfortable and sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 夏天如果你躺在竹床上，你会感到凉爽，舒适，宁静。

sentences.english: Conversely, lighter-colored objects reflect more energy and stay cooler.
sentences.chinese: 相反，浅色的物体反射更多的能量并保持凉爽。

sentences.english: Does this cool in-car total solution support the Greek language?
sentences.chinese: 这是否凉爽的车内整体解决方案支持希腊的语言？

sentences.english: The air is cool and crisp today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的空气是凉爽且清爽的。

sentences.english: Claire opened the front door, letting in a cool summery breeze.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔打开了前门，放进些凉爽的夏日的微风。

sentences.english: Kevin is cool and Myolie is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 凯文凉爽，杏儿是美丽的。

sentences.english: Our most versatile wine, Moscato Allegro is lovely on a hot day or a cold night.
sentences.chinese: 可在炎热的夏天享用，也可在凉爽的夜晚品尝。

sentences.english: It's 4am in Mumbai and the air is cool.
sentences.chinese: 在孟买，现在是清晨4点，十分凉爽。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
